overview: The Bees of Grand Staircase-Escalante is a research and documentary film project that follows two of the nationâ€™s most prominent bee researchers as they return to their backcountry stomping grounds in southern Utah. Twenty years ago they showed us what an incredible hot spot for bee diversity this place is; now, they follow up on that work as the protections for these lands are being stripped away.
title: The Bees of Grand Staircase-Escalante
